akn:content.akn:p:
§ 101938. Sunset The authority given to the Secretary under this subchapter shall expire 9 years after the date of the enactment of this subchapter. (Added Pub. L. 114–289, title VII, § 701, Dec. 16, 2016, 130 Stat. 1494; amended Pub. L. 117–328, div. G, title I, § 123, Dec. 29, 2022, 136 Stat. 4789.)
Editorial Notes
References in TextThe date of the enactment of this subchapter, referred to in text, is the date of enactment of Pub. L. 114–289, which was approved Dec. 16, 2016.
Amendments2022—Pub. L. 117–328 substituted “9” for “7”.
